npcs.text:
"I'd be careful
if you plan on
climbing that mountain," "it's got some
weird shit happening
around it."
"You ever wonder
to yourself" "why piles of
rotting bones
can talk?" "
No?" "
Really?"
"
dude...." "
duuuuude...." "
DUDE"
"heyyy...
yeahh, you over there...." "
mr funny cancerman..." "gimme a kiss.
right there, yeah.
do it." "... Drunk?
who's drunk?" "i'm not drunk,
i'm just highly
lascivious..."
"
Why?" "
Why did you do that?" "Did you derive some
sick pleasure from
what you did to me?"
"FUCK DUDE OH GOD,
my boss is going
to KILL ME." "I'm five years
late for work..." "That hotel ain't
gonna finish itself!"
"oh, hey." "Normally i'd be
pissed that you're
talking to me," "but unfortunately
i'm all outta salt." "The factory closed
down so everyone's
out of salt." "Sad days..."
"geez, what was
that guy's problem?" "some wacko in
a suit and a top
hat just ran by" "carrying a giant
pile of sawblades." "Had a banana
on him too.
What a weirdo..."
"
..."
"I AM A
SYNTHETIC MAN!" "
BEHOLD!" "SYNTHESIZED
SYNAPSES
SYNCHRONOUSLY" "SYNDICATED
TO SALIVATING
SPECTATORS!" "A CYNICAL SYNDICATE," "SUBLIME IN
ITS SIMPLICITY," "IS SYNTACTICALLY
SYNCOPATED," "FUEL FOR A
SYNAGOGUE OF
PSYCHOPATHY!" "
..." "
ALSO," "
S Y N E R G Y" "thank you,
that will be all" '
"I don't actually
exist, you know." "I'm simply a
product of your
overstressed psyche" "and hyperactive
imagination."
"
i'm dead dude." "ever wondered what
death is like?" "well then
i'm your man.
it SUCKS ASS"
"Watch it there,
buddy." "Dying is statistically
the #1 cause of
death..." "
spooky."
"mmmmmmm....
tumor"
"WOW dude that
jump you just did
was SUPER POGGERS." "I mean I was
all monkaS and
residentSleeper" "before you did
it but i'm
not gonna lie" "i'm chungus pogchamp
wholesome 100ing
right now." "SICK TRICKS DUUUDE"
"Did you know" "you can press
the talk button to
interact with NPCS?"
"that deadly nuclear
shockwave was the
only warmth i've felt" "in my life
since my wife died."
"You're looking mad
sussy now dude." "how do I know you
aren't part of that
weird tumor hivemind" "that's running amok?
You are extremely sus." "
Maybe even the impostor."
"Congratulations!!!!" "You just found the
SUPER SECRET PRIZE NPC." "Now behold,
as I present you
with a NEW CART" "that contains super
fun alternate versions" "of every normal chapter
in the base game!!" "oh shit whoops
sorry dude i dropped it," "haha i'm sure
it still works..." "oh. Nope,
it's definitely dead."
"
I...." "
fucking...." "
HATE...." "
retinaras"
"ever played this
game called
" "The End is Nigh?" "I think you might like it."
"
watch it dude," "in this world
you're either a
smart fella...." "
or...." "
a fart smella"
"dude"
"Maybe you can't
save yourself," "but perhaps
with the time you
do have left," "you can save
something else." "Ha.
Just kidding,
we're all fucked."
"if you think your
life is lame" "just remember that
someone had to
write this text out."
"
solid, liquid, gas." "
all comes out my ass"
"OY YOU THERE,
MISTER CHEEKY CANCER BLOKE." "GET OVER ERE
AND FOIGHT ME
RIGHT NOW, YEH?"
"
AAAHAHAHAHA, FOOOOOL!" "You've fallen right
into my trap!
Prepare to DIE!" "
..." "shit wait i forgot
to set the trap," "sorry man
this is really
really awkward," "just go
ahead past ok"
"gonna give you some
life advice, kid." "
Never try, and die early." "
There you go, that's it."
"Beep beep bop skidoop boop ske bep blop boop."
"We've been trying
to call you
about your car's" "
e x t e n d e d" "
warranty."
"i got killed by
a falling rock." "of all the
ways to die
in the apocalypse," "I got the lame
ass blunt force
trauma death." "Life sucks, man.
So does death."
"dude i would
literally give
like $100" "for a box of
cheese crackers
right now." "GIVE THEM TO ME."
"all these flies are
really fucking
annoying dude." "Even though i'm
basically dead they're
still absolutely insufferable"
"skibby dibby
dib yo dododo,
yo dododo," "skibby dibby
dib yo dododo," "I'm the scatman"
"the glove compartment
is inaccurately named"
"Why do the innocent
have to die?
well, they don't." "Everyone is guilty
of everything."
"have you bought
skyrim today?"
"
did you hear" "they've got skulls
in the water" "
and it's poisoned" "actually i
remember hearing" "that last part
was a hoax" "
well" "you'd better watch
out i guess"
"
look behind you!" "
heh, did i getcha?" "tricked you into
looking back at
your mess of a life!!"
"
before the whole" "
apocalypse thing" "i used to post
on the internet" "
for fun" "
but now i cant" "what more do you
want me to say,
it sucks"
"
go! speedboy!" "
catch that timer" "
grab the car" "
eat those hurdles" "choke on
my FUCKING cock" "
hit the finish line" "
WOOO! big win!"
"wow!
you're a hot one
ain't ya" "
whoooo-eee" "jaw flops
to the floor" "
tongue rolls out" "
egregious breast shots" "omitted for
your safety"
"hey!
your SOUL meter
is running low!" "hit enemies
with your body" "
to recharge it!"
"please don't leave me."
"indie darling
edmund mcmillen
dies in home, age 53." "
fans are enraged" "that the latest
isaac update will have
to be rescheduled"
"wow, aren't you
so special," "playing video games
and being unhappy
at the same time," "
i love your confidence"
"undefined"
"
do you hear it too?" "a gurgling,
writhing sound" "
coming from above"
"given a grid
of dimensions x,y" "and a set of z-size
rotatable ominoes" "which can fill
the grid without gaps" "how small must
the grid be," "or how large
must the objects be" "such that each object
can have a space within
the grid in which" "it specifically
cannot occupy in
any valid setup"
"just look at
all these sheep" "shambling around
with glassy eyes" "eating up whatever
is fed to them" "
its despicable..." "they do be lookin
pretty fluffy tho"
"
mama mia!" "
here i go again!" "my, my,
I cannot resist ya!"
"down with the
nuclear family!" "i want three moms
and two dads!" "
and fifteen grandmas!" "just imagine all
the birthday gifts!" "
i'll be so spoiled!"
"to the tune
of the scooby doo
theme song:" "stinky shitty poo,
where are you?" "
i really wanna slurp ya"
"i planted a
seed over there
a while back" "its been about
a year now" "and i think i
can see a tiny
sprout coming up" "its really
turning me on"
"do you ever feel" "like the world
is always shifting
around you?" "one moment youre
in one place..." "in the next,
youre in another." "
..." "
that just me?"
"mother,
mother,
everywhere" "mother,
mother,
in my hair" "get it out,
or i will cry" "curl right up
and wait to die"
"having trouble
navigating down here?" "
yeah?" "well you must be
pretty stupid then"
"im actually glad
mother swallowed
up the whole world" "
SAID NO ONE EVER" "
this shit SUCKS"
"im actually glad
mother swallowed
up the whole world" "im a bit
of a recluse,
and this makes it" "really easy to
get out of
seeing people"
"so ive been
catfishing this
guy online" "he thinks im
this hot
little package" "
big ass tumors" "
thick oozing gills" "and more holes
than swiss cheese." "just imagine the look
on his stupid face when
he sees the real me!"
